<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Follow-up Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=6365) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=606" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 206 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Martial Artist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=255)

**Prerequisites**
[Martial Artist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6364)

**Requirements**
Your last action was a missed [Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=2306) with a melee unarmed attack.

</column>

---

You have trained rigorously to use all parts of your body as a weapon, and when you miss with an attack, you can usually continue the attack with a different body part and still deal damage. Make another [Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=2306) with a melee unarmed attack, using the same [multiple attack penalty](/Rules.aspx?ID=2289) as the missed Strike, if any.
name: Follow-up Strike
requirement: Your last action was a missed  Strike  with a melee unarmed attack.
